name: src/index.js
Reduce
description: A factory for creating reducer queries.

name: eventsOfType
description: Creates a reducer query over events in scope matching the event type specified.

unknown.tagValue: {ReducerBuilder} The query over the matching events

return.description: The query over the matching events

name: allEvents
description: Creates a reducer query of over all events in scope.

unknown.tagValue: {ReducerBuilder} The query over the events in scope

return.description: The query over the events in scope

name: value
description: A reducer query returning the value provided.

unknown.tagValue: {ReducerBuilder} - The reducer query containing the value

return.description: The reducer query containing the value

name: structure
description:
Builds a a reducer query from a structure of reducer queries and constants representing
the reduced structure.

return.description: The reducer query builder

name: never
description: A reducer query that never produces any updates in state.

return.description: The reducer query builder

name: src/option.js
Option
description: Represents an optional type, i.e., some value or none.

name: isSome
description: Returns true if the option wraps a value, i.e., if it is some

name: isNone
description: Returns true if the option doesn't wrap a value, i.e., if it is none

name: none
description: Returns none.

return.description: [description]

name: some
description: Returns the value wrapped as a some option.

return.description: The value wrapped in an option

name: get
description: Returns the value if the option is a some otherwise throws.

return.description: The value.

name: map
description: Maps the value wrapped in the option if any.

return.description: The mapped option

name: filter
description: Filters the value wrapped in the option if any. If it passes the predicate retains some otherwise none.

return.description: The filtered option

name: otherwise
description: Returns the value wrapped in the option if some otherwise the other value passed as an argument.

return.description: The wrapped value if some else otherValue

name: reduce
description:
Returns the seed if none otherwise accumulates a new value using the seed and the wrapped value using the
accumulator function.

params.name: accumulator
params.description: The function to accumulate a result if some

params.name: seed
params.description: The value to return if none wrapped

return.description: The accumulated value or the seed if none

name: bind
description:
Returns none if none otherwise the option produced by projecting the wrapped value onto another option using
the selector function.

return.description: The resulting option.

name: src/reducer-builder.js
ReducerBuilder
description: A fluent reducer-query builder.

name: _parent
description: The previous reducer in the fluent chain.

name: select
description: Maps the reduced value onto another value using a function.

unknown.tagValue: {ReducerBuilder<T2>} A reducer builder that maps the value

return.description: A reducer builder that maps the value

name: map
description: Maps the reduced value onto another value using a function.

unknown.tagValue: {ReducerBuilder<T2>} A reducer builder that maps the value

return.description: A reducer builder that maps the value

name: flatReduce
description: Maps a value onto a reducer and produces values from that producer until the next value.

params.name: reducerSelector
params.description: The function to project a value onto a reducer builder.

return.description: A reducer builder

name: where
description: Filters the value by applying a predicate function to the value

unknown.tagValue: {ReducerBuilder<T>} A reducer builder that filters using the predicate

return.description: A reducer builder that filters using the predicate

name: filter
description: Filters the value by applying a predicate function to the value

unknown.tagValue: {ReducerBuilder<T>} A reducer builder that filters using the predicate

return.description: A reducer builder that filters using the predicate

name: scoped
description: Scopes the events that are visible to reducers in the fluent chain leading to this.

unknown.tagValue: {ReducerBuilder<T>} A reducer builder that is scoped to events passing the predicate.

params.name: predicate
params.description: The predicate to determine if an event is in scope.

return.description: A reducer builder that is scoped to events passing the predicate.

name: sum
description: Accumulates the sum of the reduced values.

unknown.tagValue: {ReducerBuilder<T>} A reducer builder that accumulates the sum

params.name: zeroValue
params.description: The zero value for the addition operator.

return.description: A reducer builder that accumulates the sum

name: fold
description: Accumulates using the accumulate function over the reduced values.

unknown.tagValue: {ReducerBuilder<T2>} A reducer builder that accumulates the sum

params.name: seedValue
params.description: The seed value for the accumulation.

return.description: A reducer builder that accumulates the sum

name: toDictionary
description:
Accumulates a dictionary from deltas. Remove deltas will be applied before add deltas.
TODO: Use a persistent map data structure. Currently O(N) per delta but could be O(log2(N))

return.description: A reducer builder

name: build
description: Constructs a reducer from the query defined using the builder.

return.description: a reducer query

name: unwrap
description: INTERNAL Returns the most recent reducer in the fluent chain.

return.description: The most recent reducer in the fluent chain.

name: _wrap
description: ignore

name: src/reducer-context.js
ReducerContext
description: INTERNAL Provides context for executing reducers so they can store and retrieve state.

name: constructor
description: Constructs a context used to by a tree of reducers.

params.description: The previous auxillary state used to retrieve stored values.

name: _route
description: This is the current level of scope. I.e., the route from the root to the current reducer.

name: _previousAuxillary
description: This is the previous auxillary state used to retrieve stored values.

name: nextAuxillary
description:
This contains the auxillary state built up in a reduction pass. For example, this
may include accumulator values for folds that cannot easily be derived from looking 
at the previous state.
examples:
<caption>Illustration where previous state isn't the same as the accumulator</caption>
From.events().ofAnyType().select(_ => 1).sum(0).select(x => 2 * x)

name: getEvent
description: Returns an option wrapping the event being processed or none if there is none or it is out of scope.

return.description: The event or none

name: getValue
description: Reduces the value of a child reducer and uses the storage key provided to address it in auxillary state.

params.name: storageKey
params.description: The address to use for the child in auxillary state

return.description: The value if any produced in this context by the child reducer

name: getFreshValue
description:
Reduces the value of a child reducer and uses the storage key provided to address it in auxillary state.
Doesn't use previous auxillary state to derive the value (i.e., it is "fresh").

params.name: storageKey
params.description: The address to use for the child in auxillary state

return.description: The value if any produced in this context by the child reducer

name: getPreviousReduction
description:
Returns the last value reduced by the current reducer if no storage key is provided otherwise that of
the child with the address given by the storage key. Looks up this value in auxillary state.

params.name: storageKey
params.description: The address of the child or omitted for own value.

return.description: The last value reduced by the reducer

name: scopedBy
description: Scopes the context within the action callback to only hold events matching the predicate.

return.description: the value produced by the callback

name: src/reducer-query.js
ReducerQuery
description: An entry-point to a tree of reducers forming a reducer query. Provides convenience methods for reducing events.

name: constructor
description: INTERNAL Constructs a reducer query from a reducer.

properties.name: previousAuxillary
properties.description: The last auxillary state that contains accumulator values etc.

properties.name: events
properties.description: The events to reduce (should only set one of `events` or `event` but not both)

properties.name: events
properties.description: The event to reduce (should only set one of `events` or `event` but not both)

properties.name: newState
properties.description: The newly produced state or the previous state if unchanged.

properties.name: newAuxillary
properties.description: The newly produced auxillary state that contains accumulator values etc.

name: reduce
description: Reduces new events and the previous state into a new state.

params.name: context
params.description: The last produced state if any.

return.description: The newly produced state.

name: src/reducers/any-event-reducer.js
AnyEventReducer
description: INTERNAL Yields any events in the context.

name: src/reducers/event-reducer.js
EventReducer
description: INTERNAL Yields any matching events in the context.

name: constructor
description: Constructs a reducer that yields for the given event type.

params.name: eventType
params.description: The event type to filter on.

name: src/reducers/filtered-reducer.js
FilteredReducer
description: INTERNAL Yields its source's results matching a predicate.

name: constructor
description: Constructs a reducer that yields its source's results that pass a predicate.

params.description: The predicate to test the results from the source

name: src/reducers/flat-reduced-reducer.js
FlatReducedReducer
description: INTERNAL A reducing reducer.

name: constructor
description:
Creates a reducer from the source's value using the function provided then yields results from that reducer
until the next source value.

TODO: Marble diagram to explain!

return.description: [description]

name: src/reducers/folding-reducer.js
FoldingReducer
description: INTERNAL Yields a seed and then accumulated values as its source's results are thread through an accumulator.

name: constructor
description:
Constructs a reducer that yields a seed and then accumulated values as its source's results 
are thread through an accumulator.

params.name: zero
params.description: The zero value (must actually behave like zero).

name: src/reducers/mapped-reducer.js
MappedReducer
description: INTERNAL Yields mapped versions of its source's results.

name: constructor
description: Constructs a reducer that yields mapped versions of its source's results by passing them through a selector function.

name: src/reducers/never-reducer.js
NeverReducer
description: INTERNAL Never yields

name: src/reducers/reducer.js
Reducer
description: INTERNAL The base type for reducers.

name: reduce
description: Reduces a new value given some previous state if possible.

params.name: context
params.description: The context under which to reduce a new state if possible.

return.description: Some value if able to reduce a value otherwise none.

name: src/reducers/scoped-reducer.js
ScopedReducer
description: INTERNAL A reducer that scopes the events that its source reducers (that is, reducers earlier in the fluent chain) can handle.

name: constructor
description:
Constructs a reducer that scopes the events that its source reducers (that is, reducers earlier in the fluent chain)
can handle.

params.name: predicate
params.description: The predicate to determine which events are allowed.

name: src/reducers/storage-keys.js
SOURCE
description: A common storage key for addressing the source of a reduction chain in auxillary state.

name: INNER_SOURCE
description: A common storage key for addressing an inner-source of a reduction chain in auxillary state.

name: VALUE
description: A common storage key for addressing the value of a reducer in auxillary state.

name: ROOT
description: A common storage key for addressing the root value in the auxillary state.

name: src/reducers/structure-reducer.js
StructureReducer
description: INTERNAL Yields an object that is constructed from constant and/or reduced properties. Yields a maximum of once per event and only when a child property is changed.

name: constructor
description: Constructs a reducer representing the object structure in the specification.
examples:
<caption>A reducer structure containing both reduced and constant properties</caption>
From.structure({
  foo: 'constant value',
  bar: From.events().ofAnyType().select(e => e.value)
})

params.name: structure
params.description: The structure containing constants and reduced properties

name: src/reducers/value-reducer.js
ValueReducer
description: INTERNAL Yields the provided value once.

name: constructor
description: Constructs a reducer that yields the provided value once.
